footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xianyun | Update Date: 02/26/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Crane’s Echoing Call__
BIS buffing plunge damage, Energy Recharge requirements and the most ATK% for a catalyst.

__Favonius Codex__
Common 4 star option, helping with energy requirements of her team and her.

__Oathsworn Eye__
Event weapon, but provides ATK% and Energy Recharge.

__Flowing Purity__
Useless passive, but acts similarly to Oathsworn Eye. Good in Xiao Faruzan teams where Energy Recharge isn't as needed.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Prototype Amber, Hakushin Ring__
Craftable options, but both suitable only in their niche. (Healing focus and Electro teams respectively.)

__Ballad of the Boundless Blue, Wine and Song, Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers__
Suitable free options, but there are always better options.

__5 star catalysts__
If the substat is ATK%, consider them for a statstick, as they tend to have higher base attack.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> ATK%|<circlet> ATK% or Healing Bonus

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: ATK%|Energy Recharge|ATK (unlikely to go over, but only up to 4500)

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Stars Gather at Dusk
**2)** Elemental Skill: White Clouds at Dawn
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Word of Wind and Flower

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Energy Recharge:__
Solo Anemo: 230-240%
Solo Anemo with Signature Weapon: 170-180%
Xiao + C6 Faruzan: 130-140%
Xiao + C6 Faruzan + Signature Weapon: 100%

__Song of Days Past, Maiden Beloved, 2x 2-piece mixed sets:__
Not bad, just resin inefficient, and there are a lot of  good options. Healing focus builds do lose out a little on her buffs, but pairing her with Furina can make up for this.
